name: shaw
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the parts of a potato plant that grow above the ground: If you cut the shaws off when they are still strong and green then the potatoes will stop growing.
More examplesFewer examplesThe potato shaws have grown very tall.The shaws are converting sunlight into energy to feed your potatoes. Is it OK to compost your potato shaws, even if they have blight?
